Thursday, April 25th.

I've updated the design slightly, but I will make more changes later. The "day" mode is not very good.

Tuesday, April 2nd.

This is going to be my personal blog. My next step is to change this to a single-page app by modelling my website off of Future Memories and using these principles.

I also like the idea of having the scoller bar at the top to indicate how far you are on the page, similar to the Left app. I'm also taking a lot of inspiration from TechCrunch and their design; it's very unorthodox but I like the sidebar for easy access, the infinite scrolling capability, and the small width of the text.

I also have to update the contrast of my website a little bit. Maybe I'll include a light and dark mode; we'll see.
